commit.message: configure: Option --without-xdg to disable future XDG data installation

files.patch:
@@ -172,6 +172,12 @@ AC_ARG_WITH([qrencode],
   [use_qr=$withval],
   [use_qr=auto])
 
+AC_ARG_WITH([xdg],
+  [AS_HELP_STRING([--without-xdg],
+  [disable installing XDG data (default is yes if GUI is enabled)])],
+  [with_xdg=$withval],
+  [with_xdg=auto])
+
 AC_ARG_ENABLE([hardening],
   [AS_HELP_STRING([--disable-hardening],
   [do not attempt to harden the resulting executables (default is to harden when possible)])],
@@ -1476,6 +1482,10 @@ if test x$bitcoin_enable_qt != xno; then
   fi
   AC_MSG_RESULT([$use_qr])
 
+  if test x$with_xdg != xno; then
+    with_xdg=yes
+  fi
+
   if test x$XGETTEXT = x; then
     AC_MSG_WARN("xgettext is required to update qt translations")
   fi
@@ -1487,6 +1497,12 @@ if test x$bitcoin_enable_qt != xno; then
   else
     AC_MSG_RESULT([no])
   fi
+else
+  if test x$with_xdg = xyes; then
+    AC_MSG_ERROR([--with-xdg specified, but GUI is not enabled])
+  else
+    with_xdg=no
+  fi
 fi
 
 AM_CONDITIONAL([ENABLE_ZMQ], [test "x$use_zmq" = "xyes"])
@@ -1522,6 +1538,7 @@ AM_CONDITIONAL([ENABLE_QT],[test x$bitcoin_enable_qt = xyes])
 AM_CONDITIONAL([ENABLE_QT_TESTS],[test x$BUILD_TEST_QT = xyes])
 AM_CONDITIONAL([ENABLE_BENCH],[test x$use_bench = xyes])
 AM_CONDITIONAL([USE_QRCODE], [test x$use_qr = xyes])
+AM_CONDITIONAL([WITH_XDG], [test x$with_xdg = xyes])
 AM_CONDITIONAL([USE_LCOV],[test x$use_lcov = xyes])
 AM_CONDITIONAL([USE_LIBEVENT],[test x$use_libevent = xyes])
 AM_CONDITIONAL([GLIBC_BACK_COMPAT],[test x$use_glibc_compat = xyes])

@@ -38,7 +38,7 @@ script: |
 
   WRAP_DIR=$HOME/wrapped
   HOSTS="x86_64-apple-darwin16"
-  CONFIGFLAGS="--enable-reduce-exports --disable-bench --disable-gui-tests GENISOIMAGE=$WRAP_DIR/genisoimage"
+  CONFIGFLAGS="--enable-reduce-exports --disable-bench --disable-gui-tests --without-xdg GENISOIMAGE=$WRAP_DIR/genisoimage"
   FAKETIME_HOST_PROGS=""
   FAKETIME_PROGS="ar ranlib date dmg genisoimage"

@@ -31,7 +31,7 @@ script: |
 
   WRAP_DIR=$HOME/wrapped
   HOSTS="x86_64-w64-mingw32"
-  CONFIGFLAGS="--enable-reduce-exports --disable-bench --disable-gui-tests"
+  CONFIGFLAGS="--enable-reduce-exports --disable-bench --disable-gui-tests --without-xdg"
   FAKETIME_HOST_PROGS="ar ranlib nm windres strip objcopy"
   FAKETIME_PROGS="date makensis zip"
   HOST_CFLAGS="-O2 -g -fno-ident"

commit.message:
MOVEONLY: Rename bitcoin.svg to bitcoin128.svg

The latter is the common icon name used everywhere

files.patch:
@@ -77,7 +77,7 @@ Comment: Modifications of Stephen Hutchings' Typicons
 
 Files: src/qt/res/icons/bitcoin.*
        share/pixmaps/bitcoin*
-       src/qt/res/src/bitcoin.svg
+       src/qt/res/src/bitcoin128.svg
 Copyright: Bitboy, Jonas Schnelli
 License: public-domain
 Comment: Site: https://bitcointalk.org/?topic=1756.0

@@ -54,6 +54,8 @@ DIST_SHARE = \
 BIN_CHECKS=$(top_srcdir)/contrib/devtools/symbol-check.py \
            $(top_srcdir)/contrib/devtools/security-check.py
 
+BITCOIN_SVG = src/qt/res/src/bitcoin128.svg
+
 WINDOWS_PACKAGING = $(top_srcdir)/share/pixmaps/bitcoin.ico \
   $(top_srcdir)/share/pixmaps/nsis-header.bmp \
   $(top_srcdir)/share/pixmaps/nsis-wizard.bmp \
@@ -73,6 +75,11 @@ COVERAGE_INFO = $(COV_TOOL_WRAPPER) baseline.info \
 dist-hook:
 	-$(GIT) archive --format=tar HEAD -- src/clientversion.cpp | $(AMTAR) -C $(top_distdir) -xf -
 
+if WITH_XDG
+icondir = $(datadir)/icons/hicolor/scalable/apps
+icon_DATA = $(BITCOIN_SVG)
+endif
+
 $(BITCOIN_WIN_INSTALLER): all-recursive
 	$(MKDIR_P) $(top_builddir)/release
 	STRIPPROG="$(STRIP)" $(INSTALL_STRIP_PROGRAM) $(BITCOIND_BIN) $(top_builddir)/release

@@ -78,6 +78,11 @@ dist-hook:
 if WITH_XDG
 icondir = $(datadir)/icons/hicolor/scalable/apps
 icon_DATA = $(BITCOIN_SVG)
+
+desktopdir = $(datadir)/applications
+desktop_in_files = share/qt/org.bitcoin.bitcoin-qt.desktop.in
+desktop_DATA = $(desktop_in_files:.desktop.in=.desktop)
+
 endif
 
 $(BITCOIN_WIN_INSTALLER): all-recursive

@@ -1626,6 +1626,7 @@ AC_CONFIG_LINKS([test/functional/test_runner.py:test/functional/test_runner.py])
 AC_CONFIG_LINKS([test/fuzz/test_runner.py:test/fuzz/test_runner.py])
 AC_CONFIG_LINKS([test/util/bitcoin-util-test.py:test/util/bitcoin-util-test.py])
 AC_CONFIG_LINKS([test/util/rpcauth-test.py:test/util/rpcauth-test.py])
+AM_COND_IF([WITH_XDG], [AC_CONFIG_FILES([share/qt/org.bitcoin.bitcoin-qt.desktop])])
 
 dnl boost's m4 checks do something really nasty: they export these vars. As a
 dnl result, they leak into secp256k1's configure and crazy things happen.

@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+[Desktop Entry]
+Encoding=UTF-8
+Version=1.0
+Name=@PACKAGE_NAME@
+Comment=Connect to the Bitcoin P2P Network
+Comment[de]=Verbinde mit dem Bitcoin peer-to-peer Netzwerk
+Comment[fr]=Bitcoin, monnaie virtuelle cryptographique pair à pair
+Comment[tr]=Bitcoin, eşten eşe kriptografik sanal para birimi
+Exec=bitcoin-qt %u
+Terminal=false
+Type=Application
+Icon=bitcoin128
+MimeType=x-scheme-handler/bitcoin;
+Categories=Office;Finance;P2P;Network;Qt;
+StartupWMClass=Bitcoin-qt

@@ -1424,10 +1424,12 @@ AC_MSG_CHECKING([if wallet should be enabled])
 if test x$enable_wallet != xno; then
   AC_MSG_RESULT(yes)
   AC_DEFINE_UNQUOTED([ENABLE_WALLET],[1],[Define to 1 to enable wallet functions])
-
+  AND_WALLET=' and wallet'
 else
   AC_MSG_RESULT(no)
+  AND_WALLET=
 fi
+AC_SUBST(AND_WALLET)
 
 dnl enable upnp support
 AC_MSG_CHECKING([whether to build with support for UPnP])

@@ -2,14 +2,16 @@
 Encoding=UTF-8
 Version=1.0
 Name=@PACKAGE_NAME@
+GenericName=Bitcoin full node@AND_WALLET@
 Comment=Connect to the Bitcoin P2P Network
 Comment[de]=Verbinde mit dem Bitcoin peer-to-peer Netzwerk
 Comment[fr]=Bitcoin, monnaie virtuelle cryptographique pair à pair
 Comment[tr]=Bitcoin, eşten eşe kriptografik sanal para birimi
+TryExec=bitcoin-qt
 Exec=bitcoin-qt %u
 Terminal=false
 Type=Application
 Icon=bitcoin128
 MimeType=x-scheme-handler/bitcoin;
 Categories=Office;Finance;P2P;Network;Qt;
-StartupWMClass=Bitcoin-qt
+StartupWMClass=Bitcoin-Qt

commit.message: fixup! Install bitcoin128.svg as an icon
fixup! Install bitcoin128.svg as an icon

files.patch:
@@ -1628,7 +1628,7 @@ AC_CONFIG_LINKS([test/functional/test_runner.py:test/functional/test_runner.py])
 AC_CONFIG_LINKS([test/fuzz/test_runner.py:test/fuzz/test_runner.py])
 AC_CONFIG_LINKS([test/util/bitcoin-util-test.py:test/util/bitcoin-util-test.py])
 AC_CONFIG_LINKS([test/util/rpcauth-test.py:test/util/rpcauth-test.py])
-AM_COND_IF([WITH_XDG], [AC_CONFIG_FILES([share/qt/org.bitcoin.bitcoin-qt.desktop])])
+AM_COND_IF([WITH_XDG], [AC_CONFIG_FILES([share/qt/org.bitcoin.bitcoin_qt.desktop])])
 
 dnl boost's m4 checks do something really nasty: they export these vars. As a
 dnl result, they leak into secp256k1's configure and crazy things happen.
